summary: Premium single-product ecommerce website for "Pro 2 ANC Wireless Earbuds" targeting young Indian customers, featuring a dark luxury Apple-like design, 3D floating product presentation, UPI payments, and a simple high-conversion checkout flow.
architectural_notes: Single-product ecommerce flow focused on high conversions for Indian market (UPI, INR pricing, shipping/replacement trust signals).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- 3D floating wireless earbuds hero render on black background with soft rim glow and subtle reflections (product-hero.dim_1600x1200.png)
- Wide dark luxury abstract background texture with subtle gradients/noise (bg-luxury.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Build a single-product landing page for “Pro 2 ANC Wireless Earbuds” with these sections in order: (1) Hero with large 3D-floating-style product visual, headline, price “₹1499 (Limited Offer)”, and primary “Buy Now” CTA; (2) Features section highlighting: Active Noise Cancellation, Deep Bass Sound, 30 Hours Battery Backup, Touch Control, Compatible with iPhone and Android; (3) Offer section emphasizing the limited offer price ₹1499; (4) Trust section with “7 Days Replacement” and “Free Shipping India” trust badges.

Implement a premium dark-luxury visual theme (black/near-black base) with an Apple-like clean layout, modern minimal typography, and a soft glow lighting effect around the product visual; apply the theme consistently across landing + checkout without using blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Add smooth scroll behavior and premium micro-animations (e.g., section reveal on scroll, CTA hover/press, subtle parallax/tilt on product) optimized for performance and conversion-focused clarity.

Create a simple, high-conversion checkout page that includes: customer details (name, phone, email optional), shipping address fields (address line(s), city, state, pincode), quantity selector, order summary showing the product name and total price, and a clear “Pay with UPI” step.

Implement UPI payment initiation on the checkout page using a UPI intent deep link and a scannable QR code generated on the client. Provide a single, clearly-located configuration for UPI payee details (VPA/UPI ID, payee name, optional transaction note prefix) without hardcoding unknown merchant credentials.

Add an order flow backed by the Motoko canister: create an order when the user proceeds to payment, store order details (customer info, address, quantity, amount, timestamps) and set initial status to “pending_payment”; allow the frontend to fetch the created order by id to show a confirmation screen with next steps (e.g., “Complete UPI payment, then enter UTR/reference”).

Allow the user to submit a UPI payment reference/UTR after paying; store it on the order and mark status as “payment_submitted” (without claiming automatic payment verification). Show a clear success state explaining that the order will be confirmed after verification.

Add a lightweight navigation structure for a single-product site: top nav with product name and a “Buy Now” button, and footer with basic India-focused trust/support text; keep all user-facing text in English.
